title: Keyboards and input.
body: Why I understand if you delete certain files and folder when your keyboard no longer works for abilities and such, that is all good and fine, but seriously, doing it between and sometimes in the middle of matches is very flipping annoying. I have read the other posts and what were said and I have tried it all. I have re installed and hell, I even formatted and reloaded windows 10 onto my computer and this just gets worse every day.  Is it possible something is being corrupted server side where the profile sits?  I know I am not the only one having this issue. I don't play professionally, I am a casual. I understand that I don't bring in as much money as the pro, but please find a fix and not a workaround for this.

replies.body:
You're config settings shouldn't change themselves mid-game, and if so there's something else entirely affecting them. If you've been resetting those files a few times already and it still keeps reverting, let's make sure you're performing that manual reset correctly to begin with. 

_**Follow these steps exactly to force a manual reset of your game config files**_

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
